class ProtoCFConfig[source]

class ProtoCF[source]

ProtoCF(configs:Union[typing.Dict[str, typing.Any], ProtoCFConfig], data_module:Optional[TabularDataModule]=None) :: LocalCFExplanationModule

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

data_configs = {
    "data_dir": "assets/data/s_adult.csv",
    "data_name": "adult",
    "batch_size": 256,
    'sample_frac': 0.1,
    "continous_cols": [
        "age",
        "hours_per_week"
    ],
    "discret_cols": [
        "workclass",
        "education",
        "marital_status",
        "occupation",
        "race",
        "gender"
    ],
}
m_configs = {
    "sizes": [50, 10, 50],
    "dropout_rate": 0.3,
    'lr': 0.03,
}

ae_configs = {
    "enc_sizes": [50, 10],
    "dec_sizes": [10, 50],
    "dropout_rate": 0.3,
    'lr': 0.03,
}

t_configs = {
    'n_epochs': 10,
    'monitor_metrics': 'val/val_loss'
}

from cfnet.training_module import PredictiveTrainingModule
from cfnet.train import train_model

training_module = PredictiveTrainingModule(m_configs)

params, opt_state = train_model(
    training_module, 
    TabularDataModule(data_configs), 
    t_configs
)
